Segment.name: SHD
Segment.comment: To indicate shipment details in terms of quantity, weight, and routing instructions related to credit or debit of returned product

Field.name: NumberOfUnitsShipped
Field.comment: Numeric value of units shipped in manufacturer's shipping units for a line item or transaction set

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode3
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: OrderSizingFactor
Field.comment: A product specification other than gross or net weight, or cubic feet for a line item or transaction used for order sizing and pricing purposes

Field.name: PriceBracketIdentifier
Field.comment: Identifier assigned by the vendor for a specific price bracket

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Field.name: ShipmentOrderStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of an order or shipment or the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity shipped for a line item or transaction

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
